title: Maxyfran73 draws for Sciptember 2022
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:foxtrot]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
... Man I love how Foxtrot looks.

Oh, uh, anyways, hey!  I decided to do that Sciptember thing that's been going on around, except I decided to post this like halfway through to have a gallery with lots of stuff and whatnot.

Anyhow, enough chitchat, time for the drawings~
@@ @@
-----
@@ @@
[[tabview]]

[[tab Day 1]]
[[=]]
++ Day 1: Factory
@@ @@
//Money is my religion, and capital is my god. The factory was just a reliquary. But beneath it, inside it?//

//I had a cathedral to the only thing that has ever mattered. From suffering, profit.//
@@ @@
[[image https://i.imgur.com/eMJpric.png]]
@@ @@
++ SCP-6423-ARC
++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6423 PROPHET INCENTIVE]
by [[*user Rounderhouse]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 2]]
[[=]]
++ Day 2: Reanimation
@@ @@
//What did it say?//

//I don't know. I don't speak dead languages, let alone Death's language. But it's pretty clear it doesn't want us observing the dead anymore. Probably wants us to let them rest in peace.//
@@ @@
[[image https://i.imgur.com/CS9NgaT.png]]
@@ @@
++ SCP-6143
++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6143 Spooky Spacey Skeletons]
by [[*user Sirslash47]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 3]]
[[=]]
++ Day 3: Those Twisted Pines
@@ @@
//Can you blame me? It's constantly trying to get inside my house. We'll hear it meowing outside for hours and hours, suddenly stop, and then appear in our living room like some kind of Houdini. I've watched it throw itself in front of cars, get torn apart by a coyote, and chew holes in the garage door. It creeps me out.//
@@ @@
[[image https://i.imgur.com/2Xb4QCh.png]]
@@ @@
++ SCP-4660
++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-4660 The Cat Came Back]
by [[*user Jacob Conwell]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 4]]
[[=]]
++ Day 4: Apian
@@ @@
//Our legacy is one of failure. We cannot avoid it, no matter how much we try. Look beyond the past, my daughter, or you will see it again and again and again.//
@@ @@
[[image https://i.imgur.com/C4eKTpO.png]]
@@ @@
++ SCP-5280
++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5280 Honeymandias]
by [[*user stormbreath]] and [[*user Amelia Wright]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 5]]
[[=]]
++ Day 5: Skeletal
@@ @@
//Destruction or attempted capture of SCP-4796-A results in it collapsing into a pile of pineapples. One of these pineapples contains a human skull engraved with the same symbols as the spheres, which instantaneously demanifests when SCP-4796-A reforms again.//
@@ @@
[[image https://i.imgur.com/GKdtzC2.png]]
@@ @@
++ SCP-4796
++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-4796 Sanctuary of the Sky Pineapples]
by [[*user Weryllium]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 6]]
[[=]]
++ Day 6: Future
@@ @@
//So that's it, then?//

//That's it.//

//A TGI Friday's?//

//Yup.//

//All that is, all that ever will be, becomes a mediocre fast food chain at the end?//

//Yeah. That's it. That's all.//
@@ @@
[[image https://i.imgur.com/QihMnlP.png]]
@@ @@
++ SCP-4405
++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-4405 Time Ends on a Fridays]
by [[*user OthellotheCat]] and [[*user DolphinSlugchugger]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 7]]
[[=]]
++ Day 7: Clockwork
@@ @@
//During the spring of 1905, whilst traversing the prairies of Oklahoma, Hamilton witnessed a lone instance of SCP-6854 consuming the remains of a white-tailed deer. While Hamilton made these claims public, his account was reportedly met largely with skepticism and mockery from his peers.//
@@ @@
[[image https://i.imgur.com/Y2e0V1Y.png]]
@@ @@
++ SCP-6854
++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6854 Where the Cogcows Roam]
by [[*user Dr Leonerd]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 8]]
[[=]]
++ Day 8: Hive Mind
@@ @@
//Once they have reached the child, the SCP-5168-A group will huddle around them quietly while repeating the phrase "Go to sleep". Several SCP-5168-A instances will tuck the child under any available blankets and sheets.//

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/yzX8zBP.png width="500px"]]

++ SCP-5168
++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5168 Go to Sleep]
by [[*user Lamentte]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 9]]
[[=]]
++ Day 9: Cool War 2
@@ @@
//Well brother. How do you like my story?//

//Come on, your turn now. Tell me a story.//

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/8ESG8NB.png width="500px"]]

++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/allegory-of-the-two-bothers Allegory Of The Two Bothers]
by [[*user SunnyClockwork]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 10]]
[[=]]
++ Day 10: Ranine
@@ @@
//Uhm… you both share equivalent ranks.//

//What?//

//Did you not know that? You two don't have jurisdiction over one another.//

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/yjNuqxV.png width="500px"]]

++ SCP-6264
++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6264 Temperature Tantrum]
by [[*user DrApricus]] and [[*user LAN 2D]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 11]]
[[=]]
++ Day 11: Eurtec
@@ @@
//Thank you all for coming here in such short notice, we cannot afford to waste any more time as of the moment.//

//That’s a strange phrase coming from the 'Gaming Department'.//

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/uWNjFj5.png width="500px"]]

++ SCP-6722
++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6722 The Phantasmic Foundation Speedrunning Competition of '11]
by [[*user Starch Tuber]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 12]]
[[=]]
++ Day 12: Wilson's Wildlife Solutions
@@ @@
//Dear everyone,//

//Good news!//

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/1qPtG86.png width="500px"]]

++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/critter-profile-big-blue Critter Profile: Big Blue!]
by [[*user Fish^12]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 13]]
[[=]]
++ Day 13: Moon
@@ @@
//Roland sinks into the regolith up to his knees, and his space suit dissolves. His body balloons and stretches into an ellipsoid shape as his skin becomes translucent white.//

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/p6VeZXp.png width="500px"]]

++ SCP-4829
++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-4829 Umbryo]
by [[*user Weryllium]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 14]]
[[=]]
++ Day 14: Miniature
@@ @@
//Human subjects within SCP-6433 feel no sensations of bodily discomfort, including those of thirst, hunger, or temperature sensitivity. For every second that passes in baseline reality, subjects perceive 1000 seconds and physically age 100 seconds.//

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/U9ZgEYS.png width="500px"]]

++ SCP-6433
++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6433 All the Time You Could Ever Want]
by [[*user LORDXVNV]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 15]]
[[=]]
++ Day 15: Map
@@ @@
//Everyone thinks that something that travels as fast as light needs to look like other things that are fast. In another time, you think differently.//

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/0IFMmTd.png width="500px"]]

++ SCP-2332
++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-2332 Thought Messenger]
by [[*user Zyn]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 16]]
[[=]]
++ Day 16: Dental
@@ @@
//YOUR WORK IN THE ANOMALY HAS BEEN HARD YESTERDAY, SO WHY NOT ORAL?//

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/gfc8nJ7.png width="500px"]]

++ SCP-5648
++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5648 DOCTOR ROCKEFELLER (ALWAYS WITH TEETH)]
by [[*user J Dune]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 17]]
[[=]]
++ Day 17: Corporate
@@ @@
//Call now and you will understand the glory of the universe! That's not a lie, you'll understand the glory of the universe! Because here at (Obscured by closer moo), we want to hear from moo. That's right, not you, moo!//

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/NGBBzrt.png width="500px"]]

++ SCP-6705
++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6705 The Bicameral Milk]
by [[*user LordStonefish]] and [[*user Lt Flops]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 18]]
[[=]]
++ Day 18: Hostile + Insect
@@ @@
//The Buzzard tore through our defenses, and we had no choice but to flee to the sea, or take shelter in the earth and pray that it would not root us out. Every night that The Buzzard returns, he is more and we are less.//

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/Gd9MnLH.png width="500px"]]

++ SCP-1160
++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-1160 Effective Containment]
by [[*user djkaktus]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 19]]
[[=]]
++ Day 19: Dinosaurian
++ Double Feature!
@@ @@
//No confirmed biological remains of Sapiensaurus have as yet been identified. However, the Foundation has since unearthed the fossilised remnants of several similar entities in Australia, South America, and Antarctica, dating to approximately 120 million years ago.//

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/teN2t8h.png width="500px"]]

++ SCP-6204
++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6204 Eggstinction]
by [[*user Dr leonerd]]
@@ @@
-----
@@ @@
//In my last video, I ate some parasaurolophus eggs as a joke that I now have realized is wrong. These actions don't represent me. They don't represent who I am as a dinosaur. And they don't represent the impact I want to have on the community.//

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/4ZhXmzn.png width="500px"]]

++ SCP-6556
++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6556 DINOVLOGS!]
by [[*user Pedagon]] and [[*user Dysadron]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 20]]
[[=]]
++ Day 20: Esterberg
@@ @@
//Asheworth's whiskers twitched. He'd forgotten all about Thereven. "I don't think I've seen him ever since you hit him…"//

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/LxPqOg7.png width="500px"]]
@@@@
[[=image https://i.imgur.com/XFivv8y.png width="500px"]]

++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/miau-miau-asheworth-kun Miau Miau, Asheworth-kun]
by [[*user LORDXVNV]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 21]]
[[=]]
++ Day 21: Broken Masquerade
@@ @@
//Then leaf subsides to leaf.//
//So Eden sank to grief,//
//So dawn goes down to day.//
//Nothing gold can stay.//

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/lPVVRv4.png width="500px"]]

++ SCP-7404
++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7404 Nothing gold can stay.]
by [[*user UraniumEmpire]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 22]]
[[=]]
++ Day 22: Immobile
@@ @@
[[<]]
**The Ethereal Skeleton:**
[[/<]]

[[size 500%]]##FF0000|**EL**##[[/size]]
@@ @@
[[size 500%]]##FF0000|**SEXOOOOO**##[[/size]]

@@ @@

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/gcYQVj4.png width="500px"]]

++ SCP-6969-J
++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6969-j The End of Sex 6.9: You Can (Not) Reproduce]
by [[*user Yossipossi]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 23]]
[[=]]
++ Day 23: Mathematical
@@ @@
//"You claim to be men of science, but think you can catch Penrose's Chosen unawares in their own world? How backwards. Our protector, our impossible aegis, will always keep us safe from danger."//

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/IBQ6nNb.png width="500px"]]

++ SCP-4104
++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-4104 Unknowable Geometry]
by [[*user swordlover87]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 24]]
[[=]]
++ Day 24: Omnivorous
@@ @@
//"EW EW EW FUCK EW HOLY SHIT WHY WAS THIS HERE"//

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/Nt664pk.png width="500px"]]

++ SCP-5499
++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5499 Cold Comfort]
by [[*user UraniumEmpire]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 25]]
[[=]]
++ Day 25: Performance
@@ @@
//This right here is my secret. With this kit, you'll be able to conduct everything I've done on stage and in the financial sphere. For today and today only, this entire kit will cost you 250 dollars total. Two hundred and fifty buckaroos to take your life back, people. They say you can't put a price tag on success, but I have, and it costs less than a TV. Who's prepared to make their fantasies a reality?//

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/imorVgy.png width="500px"]]

++ SCP-6592
++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6592 The Biz Wiz Experience]
by [[*user PlaguePJP]] and [[*user Ralliston]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 26]]
[[=]]
++ Day 26: Three Moons Initiative
@@ @@
//{{##ff0090|!! <3 HAPPY VALENTINE'S DAY <3 !!##}}//

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/Lp3WksS.png width="500px"]]

++ D. Ulysses Foole's Proposal
++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/dyfscp-001 Last Ride of the Day]
by [[*user daveyoufool]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 27]]
[[=]]
++ Day 27: Tactical Theology
@@ @@
//[. . .] However, assuming that this understanding of Akiva particle charge is accurate (which evidence suggests is the case), it follows that — assuming some form of afterlife exists — it is feasible to use [SCP-6130] to determine the afterlife an individual will receive.//

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/FmpNdjn.png width="500px"]]

++ SCP-6130
++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6130 In Hell, We Live]
by [[*user Yossipossi]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 28]]
[[=]]
++ Day 28: Shadow
@@ @@
//The previous iteration further clarified "Approximately one third of humans possess an innate ability to sense the presence of their SCP-012-EX.". There was no data to support this claim.//

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/q0G5vNc.png width="500px"]]

++ SCP-012-EX
++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-012-ex Eurydice]
by [[*user S D Locke]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 29]]
[[=]]
++ Day 29: Selachian
@@ @@
//Of course not, Doc. School is tiring. It's not just academics, but you've got club activities too. After I'm done with this and that, I don't even have time to play games. I'd rather stay here, where I can play and read novels to my heart's content. You may as well just not let me go, I'd rather stay here anyway.//

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/NL7cxhg.png width="500px"]]

++ SCP-CN-985
++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-cn-985 Exam Shark]
by [[*user EdwardC]], translation by [[*user tetsusquared]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 30]]
[[=]]
++ Day 30: 7000
@@ @@
//And all above us, no stars shone. There was nothing left, in the centre of all that devastation, but these things. These yellow and staring lights, trying to be something and failing.//

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/eiRGGRh.png width="500px"]]

++ SCP-7005
++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7005 The Neon God]
by [[*user Tufto]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]
[[/tab]]

[[/tabview]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
